trans-unit.source: A trigger action that removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de acionamento remove um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use RemoveStoryboard with a <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

Pause, Resume, Stop, Remove, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, remove, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pausa, retomar, parar, remover ou caso contrário, o controlo um guião gráfico principal interativamente para conseguir fazer pausa, retomar, remover ou, caso contrário, controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (tais como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar a consultar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não foi especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: When to Remove Storyboards You should use the RemoveStoryboard action to remove any storyboards begun with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: Quando remover Storyboards deve utilizar a ação de RemoveStoryboard para remover quaisquer storyboards iniciadas com uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>das <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: It's also a good idea to remove background animations when the object they animate is no longer being used.
trans-unit.target: Também é uma boa ideia remover animações em segundo plano quando o objeto que animar já não está a ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply an indefinitely repeating storyboard using an element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event, you should also create an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> that uses a RemoveStoryboard action to remove the storyboard on the element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se aplicar uma indefinidamente repetido guião gráfico principal com um elemento <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>eventos, também deve criar um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>que utiliza uma ação de RemoveStoryboard para remover o guião gráfico principal no elemento de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard"> </xref> classe.
